name: The Traveler In The Distance
description:
From the 100 Days of Drawing Series//
This 2021 personal challenge started in early March. The goal, to produce a finished piece, everyday, for 100 days. The best and most popular works of this series will make their way into the blockchain. This is the first of the series to make that leap into HEN. 
//
Most of the pieces are in black and white, feature fearless heroines, strange mystical creatures and moments of magic.
